summary: Provides a head‑dependent drain boundary implementation for groundwater flow models, encapsulating the logic that activates drainage flux only when the simulated head exceeds a specified elevation and applying a defined conductance, with optional budget tracking and utilities for package validation and stress‑period management.
business_intent: Enable modelers to accurately represent drainage features in groundwater and water‑quality simulations, improving the realism of flow calculations and supporting analysis of drainage impacts on aquifer systems.
